titles.title: No Armed Drones for DHS Act
To prohibit the United States Department of Homeland Security from purchasing, operating, or maintaining armed unmanned aerial vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 12/11/2014--Introduced. No Armed Drones for DHS Act - Prohibits the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) from purchasing, operating, or maintaining armed unmanned aerial vehicles.
